about_content: I am a QA Engineer with 2 years of experience ensuring product quality through manual and API testing, complemented by test automation. I focus on preventing defects early, designing lean and maintainable test suites, and collaborating with engineering teams to deliver stable, user‑centric releases.
skills_manual_content:
• Test Case Design & Execution
• Exploratory Testing
• Regression & Smoke Testing
• UI/UX Testing
• Cross-Browser & Cross-Device Testing
• Non‑functional checks (basic accessibility and performance smoke)
• Defect Reporting & Tracking (Jira)
skills_api_content:
• Backend Validation using Postman
• Testing RESTful APIs (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
• Verifying JSON/XML Responses
• Status Code & Header Validation
• Environment & Variable Management
skills_tools_content:
• Test Automation: Playwright (UI/API), selectors & assertions, data‑driven tests, CI‑ready runs
• Programming: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP
• Test Management: Jira, Confluence, Azure DevOps
• API Tools: Postman, Insomnia, SoapUI
• Version Control: Git, GitHub
• Databases: SQL
• Methodologies: Agile, Scrum
skills_soft_content:
• Conflict Resolution
• Training & Development
• Stress Management
• Adaptability
• Analytical Thinking
• Effective Communication
• Problem Solving
experience_neoris_content:
Nov 2022 – Nov 2024 | Montería, Córdoba, Colombia (Remote)

Responsible for quality assurance and testing for a large-scale e-commerce project, working within a multi-squad Agile Scrum environment.

Key Responsibilities:
• Executed comprehensive manual tests, including functional, regression, and usability testing.
• Designed and executed API tests using Postman to validate inter-service communication.
• Validated data integrity and consistency by executing SQL queries against the database.
• Managed the full testing lifecycle and defect tracking using Azure DevOps.

Key Achievements:
• Contributed to upholding a high standard of quality throughout the project, ensuring stable releases.
• Facilitated a smooth onboarding and transition process for the incoming team, ensuring a seamless knowledge transfer.
• Trained and mentored new QA team members on our established workflows and best practices.
projects_portfolio_content:
Description: A unique, interactive portfolio inspired by the iconic Cross-Media Bar (XMB) from Sony's PlayStation consoles. This project merges my professional skills with my passion for video games and localization, creating a memorable user experience.

Key Features:
• HTML5, CSS3, modern JavaScript (ES6+)
• Fully keyboard-navigable, mimicking the classic console interface.
• Showcases a deep appreciation for intuitive UI/UX design found in gaming.
